description: Comprehensive peripheral device information collection including displays, printers, input devices, and USB devices

displays_video_info.query: SELECT model, manufacturer, driver_version, driver_date FROM video_info;
displays_video_info.description: Graphics card and display adapter information

displays_registry_adapters.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverDesc' AND data != '';

displays_driver_versions.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverVersion' AND data != '';

displays_memory_info.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\MemorySize' AND data != '';
displays_memory_info.description: Display adapter memory size from registry

displays_monitors.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%' AND data != '';

displays_current_settings.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\%' AND name IN ('DPIScalingVer', 'Win8DpiScaling', 'LogPixels') AND data != '';
displays_current_settings.description: Current display DPI and scaling settings

printers_info.query: SELECT name, driver, location, status, sharename, attributes FROM printers;

printers_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%' AND data != '';

usb_devices.query: SELECT vendor, vendor_id, model, model_id, serial, class, subclass, protocol, removable FROM usb_devices;

usb_device_details.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USB\%' AND data != '';
usb_device_details.description: Detailed USB device information from registry

input_devices_keyboards.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND data LIKE '%keyboard%';

input_devices_mice.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND data LIKE '%mouse%';

audio_devices.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\MMDevices\Audio\%' AND data != '';

bluetooth_devices.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\BTHPORT\Parameters\Devices\%' AND data != '';

camera_devices.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\DeviceClasses\{65e8773d-8f56-11d0-a3b9-00a0c9223196}\%' AND data != '';

storage_devices.query: SELECT device, device_id, label, type, size, encrypted FROM logical_drives WHERE type != '';
